HeaderVideo.description:
A Relible Partner

in the World of

Alcoholic Beverages.

Collaboration that

Guarantees Success!

part1.title: Unique positioning of each brand
part1.description: We proudly present each product of our company, creating unique offers for our consumers. Each brand stands out with its quality, taste, and history.

part2.title: High quantitative and qualitative distribution indicators
part2.description: Our distribution capabilities allow us to deliver products quickly and reliably to any corner of Ukraine. This ensures that our beverages are always available for every consumer.

part3.title: Consistently high quality
part3.description: At the core of each of our products lies uncompromising quality. We carefully control all stages of production so that every sip brings satisfaction.

part4.title: Company in the alcohol market of Ukraine since 2002
part4.description: For over 20 years, we have earned a reputation as a reliable manufacturer and partner. Our years of experience allow us to adapt to market changes and exceed our customers' expectations.

part5.title: Diverse range of flavors
part5.description: Our portfolio includes classic vodkas, special varieties, as well as sweet and bitter tinctures. This diversity allows you to find the perfect drink for any occasion.

part6.title: Innovative production
part6.description: We constantly implement the latest technologies to improve production and meet modern quality standards. Each new product reflects our pursuit of excellence.

manufacturingLines.title: MANUFACTURING LINES
manufacturingLines.description: The factory is equipped with modern production lines that allow for the large-scale production of a variety of alcoholic beverages without compromising quality.

qualityControl.title: QUALITY CONTROL LABORATORIES
qualityControl.description: The company has its own laboratories where continuous quality control is conducted at all stages of production, from raw material selection to finished products. This ensures high quality and safety of our products.

rawMaterials.title: RAW MATERIALS
rawMaterials.description: We collaborate with the best suppliers of Ukrainian raw materials, ensuring the use of the highest quality ingredients in production and its uninterrupted supply.

productionFacilities.title: PRODUCTION FACILITIES
productionFacilities.description: The factory is located on a large territory, allowing for the expansion of production capacities and the implementation of new technologies to improve production processes.

humanResources.title: HUMAN RESOURCES
humanResources.description: The team consists of highly qualified specialists with extensive experience in the production of alcoholic beverages, ensuring a high level of professionalism and efficiency in their work.

Partners.title: Partners
Partners.description: The factory collaborates with distributors across Ukraine and plans to enter the international market.
Partners.findUs: Look for us on the shelves at:

contactForm.title: Contact Us!
contactForm.description: Please fill out the contact form below for further cooperation.
contactForm.form_description: Please fill out the necessary information so that we can provide you with a prompt response!
contactForm.success:
Thank you, your request has been sent

We will respond shortly!

diamondPage.title: Zhitniа Slozа
diamondPage.description: Zhitniа Sliozа is a Ukrainian horilka with a rich heritage and unique flavor. Its name reflects the traditions and culture of Ukraine combined with high product quality.

Origin.text: Made from the finest Ukrainian grains, which impart a special aroma and smoothness to the vodka.

Quantity.text: Purified and filtered using special technologies to achieve purity and an unparalleled taste.

Design.text: The elegant bottle design showcases Ukrainian traditions, giving the product a recognizable appearance.

News.title: News
News.descr1: The semifinal match ended in a disappointing defeat for our team.
News.descr2: HC Kremenchuk unveiled their new uniform!
News.descr3: The congress of the Ukrainian Hockey Federation took place in Kremenchuk: Serhiy Mazur is the new president of the federation.
News.text: TM 'Zhytnya Slyoza' - General Sponsor of HC Kremenchuk
